workExperiences.description:
## Incoming SWE II

Starting Fall 2023!

## SWE Intern (June 2022 - August 2022)

Worked on endpoint to fix broken partitions automatically in database sync history (Golang/MongoDB). Achieved 99% reduction in portion of database sync service startup time (from \~23 seconds to \~0.2 seconds)

details.title: Student Systems Programmer
details.short-description: Created and maintained software and packages for Rutgers University.

workExperiences.description:
- Providing adaptable and expert support for \*NIX and open source operating
  systems.

- Install, configure, and maintain the Rutgers URL shortener on test and development servers.

- Assist in the updating and migration of existing services and databases to virtualized hardware and Docker containers.

- Being part of a team responsible for building and maintaining RPM packages used throughout a user community of 70,000 faculty, staff and students.

- Work with eDiscovery team to debug, update and maintain business-critical in-house scripts written in Golang.

- Install, configure, and evaluate Cacti networking monitor for networking technicians.
Created Python script using PySpark to monitor critical machine learning model metrics on AWS CloudWatch.
I worked on the Capital One Android app! I worked with two other interns to create an FAQ screen module for the bank account opening process.

details.title: Code Sensei
details.short-description: Introduced and taught Scratch and JavaScript to children ages 7 to 14.
